name: Underwater Shells - Sea Reward
description:
"Slide your finger through the corals to combine them and complete missions. Your mission is remove the colorful tiles, each time you combine a coral inside it, the tile color will change, continue to change it until it disappears. Be fast when the level is based in time and when the level is based in number of movements. Calculate exactly what movement will be the best."

78899cf58f
